name: Jumpdrive
description: Jumpdrive is a sandbox space sim set in an alternative future heavily inspired by classic 80s sci-fi. Fight, trade and explore in a massive procedurally generated galaxy of millions of planets and stars. Amass money and power and upgrade and purchase new ships.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: ntel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 Graphics Card with 256MB of Ram or Intel HD 4000 Integrated DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space
